item.title: Spring MVC model
item.description: Spring boot Framework Spring boot framework is a strong framework helps you build a MVC model web service quickly. So in the first place, we need to understand what is MVC model Model-View-Controller Model Model represent knowledge. It represents how basic items interact with each other. Views A view is a (visual) representation of its model. A view is attached to its model (or model part) and gets the data necessary for the presentation from the model by asking questions.
